item.title: Brendan Fraser’s ‘Rental Family’ Sets BFI London Film Festival Gala
item.description: Searchlight Pictures’ “Rental Family” will serve as this year’s American Express Gala presentation at the 69th BFI London Film Festival. Directed and co-written by Hikari, whos
